article.title: Studio application for Discrete Events System (DES) engine fap2 (aka grayb). Requirements.

abstract.simpara: This document collects use-cases and software requirements for Studio application for Discrete Events System (DES) engine fap2 (aka grayb).

sect1.title: UC_001 Logging
sect1.sect2: Description CLIENT requests logging and specifies logging parameters - SYSTEM provides CLIENT with logging data

sect1.title: UC_002 Views categories
sect1.sect2:
Description CLIENT requests SYSTEM for the views categories it can provides - SYSTEM can provides the following views categories:
System view - views of system modelled Log views System visualization view - system visualize itself, it's trajectory, etc

sect1.title: UC_003 System views
sect1.sect2:
Description CLIENT requests SYSTEM for the system views it can provides - SYSTEM can provides the following types of system views:
Hierarchy view - views of system native hierarchy in form of tree Detail views - shows system components
